migrations.description: Updates nx.json to disabled adding plugins when generating projects in an existing Nx workspace
migrations.name: 18.0.0-disable-adding-plugins-for-existing-workspaces

migrations.description: Update to Cypress ^13.6.6 if the workspace is using Cypress v13 to ensure workspaces don't use v13.6.5 which has an issue when verifying Cypress.
migrations.name: update-cypress-version-13-6-6

migrations.description: Add NX_MF_DEV_SERVER_STATIC_REMOTES to inputs for task hashing when '@nx/angular:webpack-browser' is used for Module Federation.
migrations.name: add-module-federation-env-var-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Ensure targetDefaults inputs for task hashing when '@nx/angular:webpack-browser' is used are correct for Module Federation.
migrations.name: fix-target-defaults-for-webpack-browser

migrations.description: Updates two-way bindings that have an invalid expression to use the longform expression instead.
migrations.name: invalid-two-way-bindings
